in.from sentence: We propose an end - to - end approach for predicting all the predicates and their argument spans in one forward pass .

recent coreference resolution model.from sentence: Our model builds on a recent coreference resolution model , by making central use of learned , contextualized span representations .

representations.from sentence: We use these representations to predict SRL graphs directly over text spans .

role.holds between: every possible pair of text spans

Each edge.from sentence: Each edge is identified by independently predicting which role , if any , holds between every possible pair of text spans , while using aggressive beam 1 Code and models : https://github.com/luheng/lsgn pruning for efficiency .

final graph.from sentence: The final graph is simply the union of predicted SRL roles ( edges ) and their associated text spans ( nodes ) .

span representations.from sentence: The span representations also generalize the token - level representations in BIObased models , letting the model dynamically decide which spans and roles to include , without using previously standard syntactic features .

first span - based SRL model.from sentence: To the best of our knowledge , this is the first span - based SRL model that does not assume that predicates are given .
